alert.note: Alert for Gates; Hertford; Northampton (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 01 at 12:15AM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northeastern Northampton, central Hertford and western Gates Counties through 1245 AM EDT... At 1215 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Chowan University, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Murfreesboro, Gatesville, Chowan University, Gates, Conway, Woodland, Winton, Cofield, Como, Roduco, Union, Severn, Milwaukee, Tunis, Menola, Chowan Beach, Topsy, Mapleton, Buckland and Carter. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
